name: Valerie

skills.name: Swing
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Energizing Presence
skills.raw_description:
Increases the duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn. Also decreases the duration of all debuffs on all allies by 1 turn. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Protect
skills.raw_description:
Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] depends on this Champion's Level. Heals each ally according to the number of buffs they are currently under.
Lvl. 2 Shield +5%
Lvl. 3 Shield +5%
Lvl. 4 Shield +5%
Lvl. 5 Shield +5%
